web_snippets: David B. Feldman, PhD, is a clinical health psychologist and Professor of Counseling Psychology at Santa Clara University.
David B. Feldman is an American psychologist who is a full professor of psychology at Santa Clara University. His research focuses on hope, meaning, and growth.
